latest.comments: New features: Notifications disabled in spectator mode, fixed random user not found issue, new Winner event added to menu, and support for alt accounts.
latest.logchange: New features: Notifications disabled in spectator mode, fixed random user not found issue, new Winner event added to menu, and support for alt accounts.

1.3.2.comments: New version supports Whispers of Old Gods Patch. Casualstone will also let you know when a new version is available from now on.
1.3.2.logchange: New version supports Whispers of Old Gods Patch. Casualstone will also let you know when a new version is available from now on.
